```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)
```

```{r}
library(seqHMM)
```


```{r}
dhistam <- dhist %>% dplyr::filter(urlsolid == "1000backpacks") %>% select(amount)
dhistam <- seqdef(dhistam)
```

```{r}
hmmtry <- build_hmm(observations = dhistam, n_states = 3)
hmmtryfit <- fit_model(hmmtry)
hmmtryfit
summary(hmmtryfit)
```

```{r}
BIC(hmmtry)
plot(hmmtry,legend.prop = 0.3,combined.slice.label = "States with prob. < 0.05")
```
